ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank the British Columbia Centre for Disease Control (BCCDC), BCCDC Provincial Health Lab, Provincial Health Services Authority, BC Ministry of Health, BC Cancer and their respective program staff involved in data access, procurement and data management for their assistance. We also appreciate the thorough review of the paper by Rosemary Armour at the BC Vital Statistics Agency and Tej Sidhu from the BC Coroner's Service.
